item.title: Albert Hammond - For The Peace Of All Mankind
item.description:
You turn beyond so bad
That there was only
one thing on my mind
An overnight affair was
needed at the time
Hello good-bye
No searching
questions that was
clearly understood
But how was I to know
that you would be
so good
For the peace
for the peace
for the peace
of all mankind
will you go away
will you go away
will you vanish
from my mind
Will you go away and
close the bedroom door
And let everything be
as it was before-

Too much to soon
too bad it didn’t hit me
till the week
had passed
I might have saved
the day If
I had acted fast
I looked around
In case
you’d scribbled down
the number secretly
But all you left were
fingerprints and
memories
For the peace
for the peace
for the peace
of all mankind
will you go away
will you go away
will you vanish
from my mind
Will you go away and
close the bedroom door
And let everything be
as it was before
For the peace
for the peace
for the peace
of all mankind
will you go away
will you go away
will you vanish
from my mind
Will you go away and
close the bedroom door
And let everything be
as it was before-
